TestCase.name: testShouldNotEliminatePartitioning1
TestCase.Resource: select a, b, count (c) from MyTable group by a, b

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldEliminatePartitioning2
TestCase.Resource: select b, a, count (c) from MyTableP group by b, a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP]])

Calc(select=[b, a, EXPR$2]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[keep_input_as_is[hash[a, b]]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, partitionedReading]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testShouldEliminatePartitioning1
TestCase.Resource: select a, b, count (c) from MyTableP group by a, b

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[keep_input_as_is[hash[a, b]]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTableP, partitionedReading]], fields=[a, b, c])
